ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Ancient Coin Quest Failure
ygData.msgSnippet: While I haven t done or even started that quest yet, I have an awful feeling you won t get much luck in your response.  If it s like the other quests I ve
ygData.messageBody:
While I haven't done or even started that quest yet, I have an awful
feeling you won't get much luck in your response. If it's like the
other quests I've done, there should have been a "Combine" button when
you opened the box that you need to press before handing it over to
the NPC, just like when doing trade skills. The combine will take all
the bits and pieces and just convert it into the actual quest item the
NPC wants. If you didn't do that, that will be why it failed. :-(

Of course, if there isn't a combine button it may be bugged after all!

On Thu, 15 Jun 2000 03:53:31 -0500, "Daniel Sniderman"
<fuzzbone@...> wrote:

> I'm reporting this as a bug - but did I do something wrong? Does it matter
>what order the coins are inserted in the box? In hind-sight the NPC said I
>need to "Combine" them in the box. Is "Combining" something special I
>needed to do?
>
> While it would be nice to expect a response from Verant - I'm guessing I
>can get another set of the coins before I get a response from my email.
>
>Slyde Katzenjammer
>Just Dinged 44

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (44)
<Ginnunga>
...currently on a world tour, playing at a venue near you!

Mith Marr server
